phrases: W- why did you... save me?
I- I told you to get out of here...
Father will be here soon to beat him for us!
My killing order might have gotten switched around, but oh well.
Either way, it will all turn out the same.
One Ki is rapidly growing smaller.
I- it looks like my life is about at its end...
G- Goku did not make it in time...
H- however, at the very end, Piccolo surpassed even me, Kami...
Imagine, Piccolo Daimao, of all people, protecting some kid...
Gohan... you are the only one who ever spoke decent to me...
T- this last year that I spent with you was not bad...
Do not you die, G- Goha-
Mister Popo, I leave the rest to you...
T- that is an incredible Ki!
Sure enough, these guys can alter their battle powers intensely!
For a kid, you can do some amazing things, huh?
It looks like he used up all of his power just now.
T- they are just too strong...
-H- hold on, now, that is dangerous...
T- that is dangerous like that!
Goku just passed by Karin Tower.
But will he be in time?
we can always watch what is happening using Baba's crystal ball!
You want to use my sacred crystal ball to do that!?
I was not able to avenge you.
Pipsqueak, I am sending you to the Next World for sure this time.
I do not have the strength to run away anymore.
I cannot wait to see the look on Kakarrot's face...
So you have finally shown up, huh?
We have been waiting for you!
What have you come all this way for, Kakarrot?
Do not tell me you are here to tell us some nonsensical joke,
such as you have come to defeat us, or something.
Piccolo- san died to protect me.
Shocked over your dead idiot friends, are you?
Come to think of it, there was another, puny little guy, that went to pieces.
He had more power than you would expect for such a runt.
Naturally, he was no match for Nappa- sama.
There is no need to grieve for them.
You will be joining your friends soon.
After going through all the trouble to come back to life,
you just had to stroll on by, huh?
His battle power is rising higher and higher.
Here is something by way of greeting!
Way to hang on, you two.
Each of you eat half of this.
I- is not that a senzu bean?
K- Karin- sama still has them, huh?
I ate one before I came.
N- no, you save it in case you need it.
Even if we recover, we will not be much help to you.
If you do not eat it, I am throwing it away.
Kuririn, you have gotten a lot stronger, huh?
I can tell by your Ki.
I thought I had, but to no avail.
I am no use against them.
I- I just stood by and let everyone else die...
Gohan, I hardly recognized you, too.
Piccolo- san trained me, but I was not able to do anything.
With Piccolo- san dead, we will never be able to use the Dragon Balls again.
No one is coming back to life.
Let us avenge them- the three of us!
With you joining us, Goku, we might be able to deal with one of them!
Hey, Goku, you trained under some incredible guy named Kaio, right?
But I am going to fight them by myself.
You guys stay back and watch, so you do not get caught in the middle of it.
No matter how strong you are, Goku, that is crazy!
Their strength is far greater than we can even imagine!
I have never seen Goku show that much anger.
W- we have got no place getting in his way.
Remember, you are going to be paying me a viewing fee for this.
Even Piccolo has been done in!
Which means we can no longer use the Dragon Balls!
T- then, nobody is coming back to life?
What is with that look on your face?
Is this how badly you want me to effortlessly kill you?
You are going to pay for this!
There has to be some mistake!
Do not worry, I still will not be using the Kaio-ken technique on you.
There is no way you can stand up to Nappa- sama!
H- how did he do that just now?
W- when did you get behind me?
For as big as you were talking, you are not all that great.
I- I am not all that great, am I!?
I could tell from your attack just now.
Why do not you tell me...
His battle power is completely different from when he fought Raditz.
D- did you see your father's moves?
How did Kakarrot get this much power in such a short amount of time?
That punch just now was for Chaozu.
But will Goku be able to protect the earth from the hands of the Saiyans?
